actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to supplement retirement benefits for State and local law enforcement officers.

summary.text: Authorizes the Civil Service Commission to supplement retirement benefits for State and local law enforcement officers by an amount equal to twenty-five percent of his State or local retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to supplement retirement benefits for State and local law enforcement officers.
